snippet: Ed Ruscha, who quit the board of the Museum of Contemporary Art, Los Angeles, is joining the board of the San Francisco Museum of Modern Art.
abstract: Ed Ruscha, who quit the board of the Museum of Contemporary Art, Los Angeles, is joining the board of the San Francisco Museum of Modern Art.

headline.main: Shunning One Museum, Artist Heads to Another
headline.print_headline: Shunning One Museum, Artist Joins Another
